sentence.Network_cn: 那位要人到达时，俱乐部经理亲自陪他上楼。

entry.def: A manager is a person who is responsible for running part of or the whole of a business organization.

example.ex: The chef, staff and managers are all Chinese.
example.tran: 厨师、工作人员和经理都是中国人。

example.ex: ...Linda Emery, marketing manager for Wall's sausages.
example.tran: 琳达·埃默里——沃尔香肠公司的营销经理

entry.tran: (明星、艺人等的)经纪人，业务管理人
entry.def: The manager of a pop star or other entertainer is the person who looks after their business interests.

entry.tran: (球队的)主教练(在美国英语中，该词只用于棒球球队，其他运动则用 coach 一词指主教练)
entry.def: The manager of a sports team is the person responsible for training the players and organizing the way they play. In American English, manager is only used for baseball; in other sports, coach is used instead.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who controls resources and expenditures
2. (sports) someone in charge of training an athlete or a team

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,"反复做"; 2. 表名词,"……人或物品,机器"

stems_affixes.word_buile: bat打,击+er表名连续动作→batter接连重击

stems_affixes.value_cn: 喃喃而语,小声低语;抱怨
stems_affixes.word_buile: mutt+er反复做→n.喃喃而语,小声低语;抱怨 v.低声说,抱怨
stut+er反复做→stutter口吃
bank银行+er人→n.银行家
boil沸点+er物品,机器→n.锅炉;热水贮槽
command命令,指挥+er……人或物品,机器→n.司令官,指挥官
condense凝结+er……人或物品,机器→n.冷凝器,电容器
design设计+er……人或物品,机器→n.阴谋家,设计家,制图师
employ雇用+er人→n.雇主,老板
heat热+er……人或物品,机器→n.加热的人,加热器
hijack劫持,拦路抢劫+er……人或物品,机器→n.强盗,劫盗,劫持犯
record记录+er……人或物品,机器→n.记录员,录音[像]机

stems_affixes.value_cn: 解释程序,解释者,口译人员,翻译员,讲解员,注释器

labor劳动+er……人或物品,机器→n.劳动者
lead领导+er人→n.领袖,领导人;首领
light光+er物品,机器→n.打火机,引燃器
manage经营,管理+er……人或物品,机器→manager经理,管理人员
manufacture制造,加工+er人→manufacturer
observe观察+er……人或物品,机器→n.观测者,观察员,遵守者

stems_affixes.word_buile: pione+er……人或物品,机器→n.先驱,倡导者,先遣兵,先锋
print版,印刷+er……人或物品,机器→n.印刷工,打印机
prison监狱+er人→n.战俘

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生产者,制作者;演出人;制片人
stems_affixes.word_buile: produce生产+er人→producer

stems_affixes.value_cn: 接受者,收信机,收买贼赃的人,听筒

sell出售,卖+er人→n.售货者

stems_affixes.value_cn: 南方人,居住在南方的人
stems_affixes.word_buile: southern南的+er人→n.南方人,居住在南方的人
strange陌生的+er……人或物品,机器→stranger陌生人
stream流,涌+er……人或物品,机器→n.横幅,长旗,彩色纸带
support支持+er人→n.支持者,赡养者,拥护者
teenage十几岁的+er人→teenager→十几岁的青少年
transform改变,变压+er……人或物品,机器→n.变压器,使变化的人

As a result of the committee's conclusion, the branch manager Mr David Roasi reported that he had talked with McLaughlin about his extremely poor driving record.
the wireless carrier offering the iPhone in the United States, had a more reliable network, said Andrew Yu, mobile devices platform project manager at M.I.T.

A prime example Schweitzer and his colleagues cite is the 2004 collapse of energy-trading giant Enron, where managers used financial incentives to motivate salesmen to meet specific revenue goals.

sentences.en: She has long been hoping to become the assistant manager.
sentences.cn: 她很久以来就想当经理助理。

means.word_mean: 以某种方式管理人、家庭、钱财等的人

sentences.en: She's not a very good manager, she always spends more money than she earns.
sentences.cn: 她不大会理财, 总是入不敷出。

jushi.english: The manager decided to choose a responsible person to perform the task.
jushi.chinese: 经理决定挑选一名有责任心的人来执行这项任务。

jushi.english: The manager hastened to point out that his products were far superior to others.
jushi.chinese: 经理急忙指出他的产品比其他的要好得多。

jushi.english: Tom has long been hoping to become the assistant manager.
jushi.chinese: 汤姆很久以来就想成为助理经理。
